title: Freelancer
content: I worked on the development of a website for a Colombian foundation, where I designed, developed, implemented SEO, and documented its content.

title: FDS Assistant
content: I worked at KFC Colombia as an Operations Assistant, in charge of cash handling, order taking, order delivery and packaging, even supporting in its supervision to be successful in this

title: Operations Assistant
content: In charge of the kitchen area at MUNDO AVENTURA, preparing orders, dispatching orders, scheduling, inventory management, and cleaning.
